author: Cynthia Silva
title: George Takei said he's 'chilled' by Trump's use of phrase 'Chinese virus'
description: George Takei said he's "chilled" by President Donald Trump's use of the phrase "Chinese virus."
content:
Actor and activist George Takei responded to President Donald Trump's use last week of the phrase "Chinese virus."
The former "Star Trek" star appeared on MSNBC on Saturday to point out the implications of using such language.
"We are chilled by the constan… [+1591 chars]
